title: A Look At Markets, ESG Investing, And The Economy
itunes:title: A Look At Markets, ESG Investing, And The Economy
description:
Kate El-Hillow, Global Chief Investment Officer for Russell Investments, talks ESG investing and markets. Markus Schomer, Chief Economist at Pinebridge Investments, talks markets and the economy. Ted Oakley, Managing Partner of Oxbow Advisors, talks markets and gives his investment outlook. James Rasteh, CIO and Founding Partner of Coast Capital, talks markets and commodities. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
